BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix ESQL async get while task is being cancelled (#119897) (#119906) ES|QL and EQL async queries do not store the initial response in the async index. This means that async-get should retrieve results from the task, not the async index, when the query task is being canceled, as no document exists there.
